Name: Taunt
Effect: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

Name: Teeter Dance
Effect: All Pokemon on the field become confused.

Name: Teleport
Effect: Allows user to switch out. In the wild, the battle ends. Can be used like an Escape Rope outside of battles.

Name: Thief
Effect: May steal opponent's held item.

Name: Thrash
Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns, but becomes confused.

Name: Thunder
Effect: May cause paralysis.

Name: Thunder Fang
Effect: May cause paralysis and flinching.

Name: Thunder Wave
Effect: Causes paralysis.

Name: Thunderbolt
Effect: May cause paralysis.

Name: Thunderpunch
Effect: May cause paralysis.

Name: Thundershock
Effect: May cause paralysis.

Name: Tickle
Effect: Decreases the opponent's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Name: Torment
Effect: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

Name: Toxic
Effect: Causes poison that doubles in damage each turn.

Name: Toxic Spikes
Effect: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

Name: Transform
Effect: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

Name: Tri Attack
Effect: May cause paralysis, freezing, or a burn

Name: Trick
Effect: Swaps held items with the opponent.

Name: Trick Room
Effect: Slower Pokemon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

Name: Triple Kick
Effect: Hits 3 times, growing in power each with each hit.

Name: Trump Card
Effect: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

Name: Twineedle
Effect: Hits twice. May cause poison.

Name: Twister
Effect: May cause flinching. 2x damage against an opponent using Fly.

Name: Uproar
Effect: User attacks for 2-5 turns and cannot sleep during that time.

Name: U-turn
Effect: User switches out immediately after attacking.

Name: Vacuum Wave
Effect: User goes first.

Name: Vicegrip
Effect: No Added Effect

Name: Vine Whip
Effect: No Added Effect

Name: Vital Throw
Effect: User attacks last, but cannot miss.

Name: Volt Tackle
Effect: User receives recoil damage.

Name: Wake-up Slap
Effect: Power doubles if used on a sleeping opponent, but wakes it up.

Name: Water Gun
Effect: No Added Effect

Name: Water Pulse
Effect: May cause confusion.

Name: Waterfall
Effect: May cause flinching.

Name: Weather Ball
Effect: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

Name: Whirlpool
Effect: Damages opponent for 2-5 turns, opponent cannot switch/escape.

Name: Whirlwind
Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokemon runs.

Name: Will-o-wisp
Effect: Causes a burn, if it hits.

Name: Wing Attack
Effect: No Added Effect

Name: Wish
Effect: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

Name: Withdraw
Effect: Increases the user's Defense by one stage.

Name: Wood Hammer
Effect: User receives recoil damage.

Name: Worry Seed
Effect: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

Name: Wrap
Effect: Damages opponent for 2-5 turns, opponent cannot switch/escape.

Name: Wring Out
Effect: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

Name: X-Scissor
Effect: No Added Effect

Name: Yawn
Effect: Puts the opponent to sleep in the following turn.

Name: Zap Cannon
Effect: Guaranteed to paralyze target, if it hits.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Effect: May cause flinching.
